name: Monkey Business (itch) (Anton.CGI)
description:
Monkey Business is a VR platformer game for Oculus Quest where you play as a monkey who's goal is completing levels by finding all bananas, dodging obstacles and solving puzzles.

If you like Gorilla Tag and/or No More Rainbows, this project will be interesting for you.

Current version (0.0.2):

- basic menu and the intro level is ready to test the mechanics and learning curve.

Credits:

  • 3D assets http://kaylousberg.itch.io
  • Gorilla Locomotion https://github.com/Another-Axiom/GorillaLocomotion

Follow the development process on my YouTube channel:

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC01Kb0zRBkNT-cTdlTL9zeA
